name: Airwork
headline: On-demand labour that's actually good
description:
Airwork is an on-demand labor marketplace for premium blue collar workers. You can get an Airworker the same way you get an Uber, except instead of a taxi, someone shows up at your work site to work for the day.

Airwork fills 98% of shifts in 2 hours. We're currently live in 8 industries across Southern Ontario, Canada, and customers include Tesla, the Toronto Pearson Airport, and the CNE.

We're funded by YCombinator, Expa, Village Global, and SHL Capital.

founders.name: Gary Lin, Founder
founders.description: Founder/CEO at Airwork. Former engineer at Meta, Nauto, Yelp, NVIDIA. University of Waterloo Computer Science 2019 grad. Proud husband and dad.

generated_description:
### Airwork: Your On-Demand Labor Solution

Founded in 2022 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Airwork is revolutionizing how businesses in Southern Ontario secure temporary labor. Imagine needing help for your project, tapping a button on your phone, and having a qualified worker show up at your site—it's like ordering an Uber, but for labor. That's what Airwork offers—an on-demand labor marketplace focused on connecting employers with the top 5% of blue-collar workers.

#### How It Works
Airwork is designed for speed and reliability. They boast a remarkable 98% fill rate for shifts within just two hours. You post a shift, and relevant workers in your area receive notifications. With Airwork's auto-backfill feature, they can quickly find replacements if someone cancels. It's everything you need to keep your operations running smoothly.

#### Target Industries
Currently operating in eight sectors including manufacturing, warehousing, event management, landscaping, and hospitality, Airwork has established partnerships with renowned companies like Tesla and the Toronto Pearson Airport. Their sophisticated platform automates critical tasks like interviewing, scheduling, and payroll—freeing your time to focus on what truly matters—growing your business.

#### Funding and Support
Airwork is backed by heavy hitters in the startup world—including Y Combinator, Village Global, and Expa. With a small yet effective team of four, led by Group Partner Diana Hu, they are poised for significant growth.

#### Why Work with Airwork?
Traditional staffing agencies can often lead to inconsistent worker quality and high fees. Airwork changes the game. They minimize costs with a simple 30% platform fee versus the 50–100% markup found in traditional firms. Plus, no hidden fees and a straightforward process mean your business can keep more of its hard-earned money.

#### Testimonials that Speak Volumes
Customers laud Airwork for their reliability and exceptional service. Many have switched from local temp agencies to Airwork and have found their stress levels drop as they no longer have to scramble for last-minute labor.

If you want dependable, quick, and quality labor that helps you stick to your deadlines, Airwork is the platform to check out. 

Visit [Airwork's website](https://www.airworkhq.com) for more details. Whether you’re a business looking for workers or someone ready to take on short-term jobs, Airwork caters to your needs. 

In today's dynamic work environment, who wouldn’t want a solution that actually works?
